name: Space Freelancer Bunny
description:
It's the year 2115 and bunnies has taken over the entire solar system. 
You are a freelancer bunny, you and your trusty spaceship will travel the solar system and do missions in order to get money.

You can use the money to upgrade your spaceship for an even easier time travelling.

Deal with asteroids and the pesky FOX terrorist group that will harm you on your journeys with your laser turret.

Do boring delivery missions and destroying missions.

There really is no goal in this game besides getting money.

Also, press Esc to pause when you need it.
